title: TOSHIBA ChefFry Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo, 26.4 QT Large Capacity, 12-in-1 Countertop Toaster Oven, Stainless Steel
description: The Toshiba ChefFry air fryer toaster oven combo offers an 12-in-one solution in a kitchen appliance to help elevate your meals in a speedier and healthier way. Enjoy hot, crispy foods using up to 90% less oil. The 12 functions include air fry, toast, pizza, bake, cookie, roast, reheat, bagel, broil, warm, proof, and dehydrate for all of your daily cooking needs for meal preparation with delicious results. FAQ： 1. About Preheat Function With TOSHIBA's powerful ChefFry technology, the oven heats up quickly, eliminating the need for preheating when using the air fry function. Simply place frozen foods directly on the frying basket and start the air fry program. No preheating required – just crispy, healthy results. 2. About Stop or end the Program during oven working While the oven is running, press and hold the Stop button for 3 seconds to pause the current program and choose a new function. 3. How to use accessories in the box： Crumb Tray: To ensure optimal cooking performance, place the crumb tray at the bottom of the oven, below the heating element. Allow the tray to cool completely before cleaning. Air Fry Basket: When using the air fry function, place the air fry basket on the rack and spread food evenly within the basket for the best air frying results. Baking Rack: For baking bread, pizza, and other items, use the baking rack to achieve a crispy crust on both sides. Baking Tray: Use the baking tray to hold batters, fillings, and to maintain the shape of cakes, cookies, and puddings. 4. How to clean my air fryer oven？ -Power off and cool down: Always unplug the oven and allow it to cool completely before cleaning. -Remove the crumb tray: Remove the crumb tray from the oven and clean it with warm water and dish soap. -Clean the interior: - For light stains: Wipe the interior, door, and heating elements with a soft cloth and warm water. - For stubborn stains: Create a paste of baking soda and water, apply it to the stains, let it sit for a few minutes, then scrub. -Clean the exterior: - For standard mater
